text: ke( k rou n) ban niyeay tha tampit avei delke ban bratan vea aoy khnhom ku daoysaarte chamnehvichchea del khnhom mean . tae ke minban doeng te tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh ban bamphlanh cheachraen chomnean mk haey moun roubke delke( puok chomnean moun) chea anak khlang ning meanotropy sa mb tde chraenchang roubke towtiet noh? haey puok del br pru td babakamm min trauv ke suor ampi babakamm robsa puokke laey
